title: Stormcaller Secrets
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship faces storms and runes
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship debates trust and next steps while camping west of Raven's Hold.
Vola argues for an alliance against Agata Dustmother and suggests returning to Chardon.
The party travels towards a permanent storm, encountering a wildfire-scorched landscape.
Inside the storm, runes compel Delwath to attack Seeker, but the party manages to move past.
They find Stormcaller Tower surrounded by a calm circle, with a Chardonian grave nearby.
Delwath investigates the tower, encounters destruction and an aggressive arcane construct.
The party learns of a power growing in the desert with ambitions of betrayal and revenge.
At dusk, they notice that familiar constellations are missing from the night sky.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship braves a magical storm to uncover secrets at Stormcaller Tower, discovering ominous changes in the night sky.
location: on the plains near Stormcaller Tower
